short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your Salesforce admin and developer experience with our Chrome extension, designed to streamline your daily tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Profile & Permission Set Comparison: Quickly compare profiles and permission sets side-by-side to identify differences and ensure consistent security settings across your Salesforce org.

Global Search: Effortlessly search for keywords within your Salesforce org.

Lookup Tree Visualization: Create a visual tree of lookup relationships between specific records and Salesforce objects.

Record Visibility & Field History Tracker: Determine who has access to specific records and view field history to audit changes and ensure data integrity.

CSV Export: Easily export your comparison results, search outcomes, or other data into CSV files for further analysis or reporting.

Simplify your Salesforce management with this powerful and easy-to-use extension, designed for both admins and developers looking to enhance their productivity.
